Posts.EditableText: I accidentally made too many planet tauran quest.I cannot delete them for some reason.

Posts.EditableText: no one answered my question.Or is it normal.
Posts.HTML: no one answered my question.Or is it normal.

Posts.EditableText:
Is planet Tauran an object in your game or did you publish multiple Tauran games?  I assume it’s the first because to publish multiple games you would need to change the game ID for each new publication.  Or do you have multiple Tauran.quest files on your computer.  I think that’s how it works.

Anyway, I guess I would need better clarification to what you are asking.
